projects.title: tia
projects.description: A centralized web-based solution for stock-management and invoicing for a local business based in Kuwait.

projects.title: reviewd
projects.description: Reviewd, is a video game review aggregator that brings the top critics in gaming all in one place. The reviews are collected from the top publications in gaming, such as IGN, GameSpot, Polygon, and Eurogamer.

projects.title: alumna
projects.description: A social media app for the alumni of colleges under the Directorate of Higher Education, Goa. The project was written in Java and JSP and was built during The Smart India Hackathon.
